nodes.text: The Reckless Abandon was a Gallofree Yards transport which was escorted to Borleias in 27 ABY during the Yuuzhan Vong War. Delivering vital supplies for the New Republic garrison stationed on the planet, Reckless Abandon was accompanied by the Taanab Yellow Aces. Although attacked by Yuuzhan Vong forces as it journeyed towards Borleias, the transport was protected by several New Republic starships and made its way safely to its destination.
The Reckless Abandon was an unknown class of Gallofree Yards transport.

Following the loss of Coruscant to the Yuuzhan Vong in 27 ABY, the New Republic Third Fleet set up a defense on Borleias in order to tie down the Yuuzhan Vong fleet while the Advisory Council recovered from the conquest of its capital. The Reckless Abandon delivered supplies to Borleias while it held out against the Yuuzhan Vong, delivering much needed goods and support to the embattled garrison. Escorted by New Republic starfighter pilot Wes Janson and his Taanab Yellow Aces, the Reckless Abandon set out for Borleias, loaded with munitions, foodstuffs, ammunition and several barrels of Taanab fruit brandy.

When it came out of hyperspace in the Pyria system, the Reckless Abandon and its fighter escorts emerged in a dovin basal minefield positioned by the Yuuzhan Vong. Yorik-et, Yuuzhan Vong starfighters, converged on the transport, but it was able to be protected by Janson and his squadron. One of the capital ships defending Borleias, the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Mon Mothma, moved to aid the Reckless Abandon as it performed a series of microjumps towards Borleias. The Reckless Abandon was then protected by starfighters from another New Republic Star Destroyer, the Imperial I-class Rebel Dream, as well as Twin Suns Squadron. With so many New Republic starships defending it, the transport made its way towards Borleias.

The Reckless Abandon arrived safely at the planet, but not before its captain had to intervene on the New Republic military communications channel in order to ask Janson to refrain from his flirting with Jaina Solo, Twin Suns One. The transport later transmitted its inventory to Wedge Antilles, who commanded the Borleias garrison.
